page.title: 16A Day in the Life of a Child
page.content: Continued Mum goes to work too. She works at a greengrocers in the village for about four hours a day. I have to take my bag to school which is heavy today because as well as my packed lunch I have my football kit as we have a school match against Tilney All Saints School this afternoon. I leave for school just after eight thirty and it takes me about ten minutes to walk. I have to cross the main road but there is a lollipop lady to see the children safely across. At school I go into the playground to meet my friends. All the boys are talking about the match. It is an important one because if we win we will be top of the league. At nine the bell goes and we go into class for registration. About half of us have school dinner,one person goes
